makeupRulesDefault: Making up for classes missed due to excused absence is possible with another group realizing the subject at a date agreed with the teacher or subject coordinator.
lecture: Attendance at lectures is not mandatory.
base: Attendance at [[locative]] is mandatory. A maximum of [[absences]] is allowed. Justification of absence should take place no later than within a week of the end of the absence. The appropriate document must be shown or sent by e-mail to the teacher or subject coordinator.
